reuters.title: BURLINGTON COAT FACTORY <BCF> 2ND QTR NET
reuters.body: quarter ended May 2 Shr 20 cts vs 17 cts Net 2,319,000 vs 1,950,000 Sales 92.4 mln vs 72.2 mln Six mths Shr 1.60 dlrs vs 1.27 dlrs Net 18.7 mln vs 14.8 mln Sales 285.9 mln vs 227.1 mln NOTE: Full name is Burlington Coat Factory Warehouse Corp. Reuter 
